info.name: Vendors
info.description: An invoice is a bill of sale for goods or services provided by a vendor. This API provides methods to create, update, or delete invoice vendors.

query.description: The maximum number of items to be returned in a  response. The default is 25 and cannot exceed 1000.
Specifies the starting point for the next query when iterating through the collection response.  Use with paged collections of resources.
ascending or descending, The default value will be ascending.

Field you need to the results to be sorted by. Vendor Name will be made default if no value is sent. Only fields that are added to the vendor form can be used here. Fields have to be specified by name as specified in Doc.
Applies for the entire given search parameters. The default value is exact. Supported values: exact, begins, contains, ends
Buyer Account Number to be searched
Payment Method Type to be searched. Valid values are ACH, CARD, CHECK, CLIENT, PAYPVD, VCHER, WIRE

request.description: Gets an existing vendor. Note: If authenticating with a Company access token the API will return all vendors associated with a specific entity.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

Field you need to the results to be sorted by. Vendor Name will be made default if no value is sent. Only fields that are added to the vendor form can be used here. Fields have to be specified by name as specified in Doc.
